title: On the Waterfront
description: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

title: Rear Window
description: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window, and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

title: Seven Samurai
description: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, who gathers six others to join him.

title: Godzilla
description: American nuclear weapons testing results in the creation of a seemingly unstoppable, dinosaur-like beast.

title: Dial M for Murder
description: A tennis player frames his unfaithful wife for first-degree murder after she inadvertently hinders his plan to kill her.

title: Sabrina
description: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
description: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

title: A Star Is Born
description: A movie star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: The Caine Mutiny
description: When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardizes the ship, the first officer relieves him of command and faces court martial for mutiny.

title: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: In 1850 Oregon, when a backwoodsman brings a wife home to his farm, his six brothers decide that they want to get married, too.

title: White Christmas
description: A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.

title: Creature from the Black Lagoon
description: A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.

title: La Strada
description: A care-free girl is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.

title: The Country Girl
description: A director hires an alcoholic has-been and finds himself falling for the actor's suffering wife.

title: Three Coins in the Fountain
description: Three American women working in Rome, Italy, share a spacious apartment and the desire to find love and marriage, each throwing a coin in the fountain to wish for it.

title: The High and the Mighty
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: When a commercial airliner develops engine trouble, the diverse group of passengers and crew must face their pasts and potential futures.

title: Magnificent Obsession
description: A reckless playboy inadvertently causes the blindness of a doctor's widow, then studies to become a surgeon to restore her sight.

title: The Barefoot Contessa
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: At the funeral of a Spanish dancer turned Hollywood star, a director recalls how he discovered her.

title: Johnny Guitar
description: A strong-willed saloon owner clashes with the local townspeople and a rival bank owner, fueling a confrontation that involves a mysterious guitar-playing gunman.

title: River of No Return
description: A farmer and his son rescue a saloon singer and a gambler from a raft, only to have the gambler steal their horse and gun, leaving them to survive the river and Indians.

title: Vera Cruz
description: During the Mexican Rebellion of 1866, an unsavory group of American adventurers are hired to escort a countess to Vera Cruz.

title: Carmen Jones
description: A contemporary adaptation of Bizet's opera Carmen, featuring an all-black cast.

title: Them!
description: The earliest atomic tests in New Mexico cause common ants to mutate into giant man-eating monsters that threaten civilization.

title: Brigadoon
description: Two Americans on a hunting trip in Scotland become lost and discover a small village that appears only once every 100 years.

title: The Glenn Miller Story
description: Biographical film about the band leader Glenn Miller, following his rise to fame and untimely death.

title: Executive Suite
description: When the president of a major furniture company dies unexpectedly, a boardroom power struggle ensues to name his successor.

title: Broken Lance
description: A cattle baron struggles to keep his empire together as his three sons compete for his approval.

title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
description: A lawyer and World War II veteran is recalled to service to fly bombers in the Korean War.

title: Sansho the Bailiff
description: In medieval Japan, a compassionate governor is sent into exile. His wife and children try to join him, but are separated, and the children grow up amid suffering and oppression.

title: Journey to Italy
description: An unhappily married couple attempts to find direction in their lives while visiting Naples.

title: Animal Farm
description: A successful farmyard revolution by the resident animals vs. the farmer goes horribly wrong as the victors create a new tyranny among themselves.

title: The Far Country
description: A self-minded adventurer locks horns with a crooked lawman while driving cattle to Dawson.

title: Apache
description: After the Apache Indians have surrendered to the US Army, one of them, Massai, refuses to accept defeat and wages a one-man war against the US.

title: Garden of Evil
description: Three American soldiers of fortune are hired by a woman to rescue her husband, trapped in a gold mine in Indian territory.

title: Suddenly
description: A small-town family is held hostage by assassins planning to kill the President of the United States.

title: It Should Happen to You
description: A woman determined to make a name for herself buys a billboard in Columbus Circle, attracting the attention of a documentary filmmaker and a soap tycoon.

title: Hobson's Choice
description: A tyrannical bootmaker gets his comeuppance when his eldest daughter marries his best workman and sets up a rival shop.

title: Touchez Pas au Grisbi
description: An aging gangster pulls off a massive gold heist, but things get complicated when a rival gang finds out.

title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
description: A writer recalls his romance with a beautiful American girl in post-WWII Paris.

title: Human Desire
description: A Korean War vet returns to his railroad job and falls in love with the wife of a coworker who is a murderer.

title: Salt of the Earth
description: Mexican-American miners strike for equal wages and conditions, but they are forced to overcome not just the company, but their own prejudices.

title: The Silver Chalice
description: A Greek artisan is commissioned by the Apostle Luke to cast the cup of Christ in silver and sculpt around its rim the faces of the disciples and Jesus himself.

title: Phffft
description: A lawyer and a writer divorce, only to find they were happier married.

title: Riot in Cell Block 11
description: A riot breaks out in a prison, instigated by an inmate protesting the brutal conditions.

title: Drive a Crooked Road
description: A lonely mechanic and racing car driver dreams of racing in the big European races, but gets involved with a gang of bank robbers.

title: Crime Wave
description: An ex-con tries to go straight but gets pulled back into the criminal life when old cellmates escape from San Quentin.

title: The Long, Long Trailer
description: Nicky and Tacy are going to be married. Nicky wants to save money for a house, but Tacy dreams of a trailer. After the wedding, they tow their home to a honeymoon in the Colorado mountains.

title: Susan Slept Here
description: A screenwriter takes in a delinquent teenager to research a script, but complications ensue when they start to develop feelings for each other.

title: Demetrius and the Gladiators
description: A Christian slave is forced to fight in the Roman arena as a gladiator and finds his faith tested.

title: King Richard and the Crusaders
description: During the Third Crusade, King Richard the Lionheart faces treachery in his camp and battles Saladin for control of the Holy Land.
